TopicTitle: Cant fix ksp version, forgotten steam password

Articles.Content: Ok, first, i dont know where i should place this topic, so i just randomly placed it here, but anyways, since i'm dumb, i  just used the KSP to do the modded KSP, which is still on 1.1.3, but then i realized that, so i decided to copy that modded KSP, then delete all the mods on the other copied version, i deleted mods, saves, and all things in my opinion, could make KSP unable to update. Then i realized it was still 1.1.3, and i forgot my steam password, couldnt find it anywhere else  (i must go into steam to (maybe) upgrade KSP to 1.2.2). How can i update KSP now?

Hi @hanhan658, sorry but Squad doesn't run Steam, there's nothing we can do here for issues with Steam accounts, you need to contact Valve, here is the page for Steam account recovery from lost passwords.

Good luck.
